lemma shows map_indets_zero [simp]: "map_indets f 0 = 0" and map_indets_one [simp]: "map_indets f 1 = 1" and map_indets_uminus [simp]: "map_indets f (- r) = - map_indets f (r::_ \<Rightarrow>\<^sub>0 _::comm_ring_1)" and map_indets_plus: "map_indets f (p + q) = map_indets f p + map_indets f q" and map_indets_minus: "map_indets f (r - s) = map_indets f r - map_indets f s" and map_indets_times: "map_indets f (p * q) = map_indets f p * map_indets f q" and map_indets_power [simp]: "map_indets f (p ^ m) = map_indets f p ^ m" and map_indets_sum: "map_indets f (sum g A) = (\<Sum>a\<in>A. map_indets f (g a))" and map_indets_prod: "map_indets f (prod g A) = (\<Prod>a\<in>A. map_indets f (g a))"
